HPI 8829 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1996 All Japan GT Fuji 5th Place M. Kageyama/K. Hoshino

Manifacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8829/8829.html

3rd time's the charm, or something like that, right? This is another Ebbro x HPI collaboration model of the #1 Calsonic car but from 1996 this time. This one is from round 2: All Japan GT Fuji. Masahiko Kageyama and Kazuyoshi Hoshino qualified in 11th place and fought their way through the field to finish in a respectable 5th place. Especially since the top 4 finishers started in 2nd - 5th place! To me it looks like there's a lot more noticeable differences between this one and the two 1995 models previously posted.







Sources:
All Japan GT Fuji 1996 - Race Results - Racing Sports Cars
GTC Official Web Site - GT Championship 1996 - R2
